alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:36PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Norfolk, southeastern Worcester and south central Middlesex Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 635 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Millbury, or 7 miles south of Worcester, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Milford, Westborough, Grafton, Ashland, Bellingham, Auburn, Northbridge, Hopkinton, Oxford, Holliston, Uxbridge, Millbury, Medway, Blackstone, Sutton, Douglas, Upton, Hopedale and Mendon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for eastern, central and northeastern Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk
